pages.text:
About Us
fck Welcome to BubbaQue's, where we take BBQ very seriously. From the moment guests step through the door until the last swipe of sauce is soaked up, the focus is on creating an enjoyable dining experience that celebrates Southern culture, cooking, and hospitality. BubbaQue's specializes in expertly smoked cuts of pork, beef, and chicken, accompanied by freshly prepared Southern side dishes made from traditional recipes and quality ingredients. The restaurant's origin story dates back to the 1950s, when Ethel and Jed, proud parents of their only child, Bubba, fostered a warm atmosphere centered around good food, laughter, and the formation of lasting friendships that felt like family. At BubbaQue's, the spirit of community is paramount. Every Sunday at their home, Ethel and Jed hosted gatherings filled with good company, sweet tea, and, most importantly, exceptional barbecue. Uncle Jed was particularly proud of his barbecue, earning numerous trophies and accolades for his skill. His impressive smoker became a centerpiece for family celebrations, from weddings to baptisms. As Bubba learned the art of barbecue from Uncle Jed, he absorbed the essence of their gatherings—inviting good people to share delicious food and fun, transforming friends into family. Today, BubbaQue's carries forward this legacy of great food and warm hospitality, inviting everyone to experience the joy of Southern barbecue. Join us and become a part of our family! About Us

employment
fck Do you like BBQ? Would you like to work for BubbaQue's? We're growing and ready for you! Download the form, fill it out, and shoot us an email or bring it by your local BubbaQue's to apply; OR, just fill out the form on this page and a member of our team will be in touch. bubba@bubbaquesbbq.com Download Pdf Version of Application fck Personal Information First Name * Last Name * Email * Phone * Job Information Positon Desired * Availability * Select one Full Time Part Time Location * Select one Brandon BubbaQue's BBQ Corporate Chiefland Crystal River Dade City East Lakeland Leesville North Lakeland Riverview Sun City Center Date Available to Start * Desired Pay * Resume Confirmation * I'm 18+ and authorized to work in the US.
